_comment_description: Node.js package configuration for the ShadowNews React frontend application
_comment_architecture: This package.json defines dependencies, scripts, and configuration for the ShadowNews email-first social platform frontend built with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
_comment_platform: ShadowNews combines traditional social news features with email repositories, snowball distribution, and AI-powered community tools.

_footer_description: This package.json orchestrates a comprehensive React application with TypeScript, testing frameworks, build optimization, and email-first social platform features. It provides a complete development environment with code quality tools, automated workflows, and modern web development best practices.
